alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 11:31AM EST until February 02 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River from Edwardsport to Hazleton. .Minor flooding will continue on the East Fork White at Seymour until Tuesday morning. Minor lowland flooding will continue at Edwardsport and develop over the next couple of days at Petersburg and Hazleton on the White River and last through the week. The crest on the White is between Spencer and Elliston. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Petersburg. * WHEN...Until late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Flooding affects low agricultural lands, low oil fields and closes Bottoms Rd...Brothers Rd and East Governors Road in Knox County. In agricultural season...farmers are concerned at this stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Monday /9:30 AM CST Monday/ the stage was 15.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this afternoon to 17.1 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 245 AM EST /145 AM CST/.
